docs.text:
Welcome to Opinator Documentation


The Opinator project is created mainly using python, postgresql, nltk and stanford corenlp. A little knowledge in these will help in modifying few parts of the project. However, following the steps will serve the purpose of installing, building and deploying the entire project.


It is prefered that you use a linux system


Technologies Used




Scrapy


Flask


NLTK


Stanford Corenlp


Postgresql




Project Components




Browser Extension


Web Scraper(scrapy)


Flask Server


Analyzer

docs.text:
Installation


In order to install MkDocs you'll need Python installed on your system, as well as the Python package manager, pip. You can check if you have these already installed like so:


$ python --version
Python 2.7.2
$ pip --version
pip 1.5.2




Opinator supports Python 2.6, 2.7.


Download Project


Download the 
Opinator Server project
 from Github.


You can also use git to clone the repo to your local system using:


$ git clone https://github.com/vivekanand1101/opinator2.git
$ cd opinator2




Install Dependencies


Run the following codes to install all dependencies:


$ ./install.sh
$ sudo pip install -r requirements.txt
$ sudo python setup.py

docs.text:
This act as the client side to use the project in various e-commerce website. For the time we have extensions for 
Mozilla Firefox
 and 
Google Chrome


Download Project


Download the 
Opinator Extension project
 from Github.


You can also use git to clone the repo to your local system using:


$ git clone https://github.com/SaptakS/opinator-plugin.git


Chrome Extension




Open google chrome browser


Go to url 
chrome://extensions


Check the 
Developer Mode
 checkbox


Click on 
Load unpacked extension..
 and upload the Chrome Extension folder from the downloaded/cloned folder




Mozilla Extension
docs.title: Deploy Extension

docs.text: Download the  Opinator Extension project  from Github.  You can also use git to clone the repo to your local system using:  $ git clone https://github.com/SaptakS/opinator-plugin.git
docs.title: Download Project

docs.text: Open google chrome browser  Go to url  chrome://extensions  Check the  Developer Mode  checkbox  Click on  Load unpacked extension..  and upload the Chrome Extension folder from the downloaded/cloned folder
docs.title: Chrome Extension
